text: József Tóth (2 December 1951 – 11 August 2022) was a Hungarian footballer. He made 56 appearances for the Hungary national football team between 1974 to 1983.József Tóth Statistics FIFA. Retrieved 4 February 2010. He appeared at the 1978 FIFA World Cup and the 1982 FIFA World Cup.planetworldcup.com: Hungary's squad for 1978 World Cupplanetworldcup.com: Hungary's squad for 1982 World Cup ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungarian football managers
title: József Tóth (footballer, born 1951)
